text: Tatse git fengeshwotswere tatse git ink'wotsi21:21 Ink'uwa: Ink'wo aats k'arotse beef k'ot'ik'olo bígtsots shiyo b́kindor shiyman bín b́k'oawok'o bíatsotse ilac'ok'o kishde'er shiyman bín b́k'oawok'o shiy man bin bi ipef goiliru keewatsna bíazefo, manwere ink'wo b́wotiti.  botesh, fengeshwots ik ikon ik ink'won fiineka botesh, kitu weronúwere mastayitok'o shááno beshiyiru s'ayin awntson doozeka b́tesh.
